# ðŸ¤– ã‹ã‚‰ãã‚Šã‚¨ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒ³ãƒˆ

ã€Œ**ã‹ã‚‰ãã‚Šã‚¨ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒ³ãƒˆ**ã€ã¯ã€ã‚ã‚‰ã‚†ã‚‹ç’°å¢ƒï¼ˆã‚¹ãƒžãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚¹ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ¼ã€ãƒãƒ£ãƒƒãƒˆãƒ„ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã€Webã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªãªã©ï¼‰ã‹ã‚‰ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹å¯èƒ½ãª **AIã‚¨ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒ³ãƒˆ** ã‚’ç›®æŒ‡ã—ãŸã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ³ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã§ã™ã€‚  
å¤šç¨®å¤šæ§˜ãªã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚„ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã¨ã®çµ±åˆã«ã‚ˆã‚Šã€**1ã¤ã®ã‚¨ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒ³ãƒˆ** ã¸ **ã©ã“ã‹ã‚‰ã§ã‚‚ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹å¯èƒ½** ãªä¸–ç•Œã‚’å®Ÿç¾ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚  
è¤‡æ•°ã®ã‚¨ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’åŒæ™‚ã«å®šç¾©ã—ã€ãã‚Œãžã‚Œã«ç•°ãªã‚‹å½¹å‰²ãƒ»æ€§æ ¼ãƒ»éŸ³å£°ãƒ»ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‚’å‰²ã‚Šå½“ã¦ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚å¯èƒ½ã§ã™ã€‚

## æŠ€è¡“æ¦‚è¦

### ðŸš€ **ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ‰**:
- ãƒ•ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯: FastAPI

### ðŸª¶ **ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«å¯¾å¿œ (LLM)**: 
LiteLLMã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã—ã€[LiteLLM](https://github.com/BerriAI/litellm)ãŒã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«(ä¾‹: OpenAI, Ollama)ã«ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹å¯èƒ½ã€‚  
- **OpenAIãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«åˆ©ç”¨ã®ä¾‹**: [OpenAI APIã‚­ãƒ¼](https://platform.openai.com/) ã‚’å–å¾—ã—ã€`.env`ã«APIã‚­ãƒ¼ã‚„ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‚’è¨­å®šã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚  
- **Ollamaãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«åˆ©ç”¨ã®ä¾‹**: [Ollama](https://docs.ollama.ai/)ã‚’ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã§èµ·å‹•ã—ã€ãã®URLã‚’`.env`ã«è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§åˆ©ç”¨å¯èƒ½ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

### ðŸŽ™ï¸ **éŸ³å£°åˆæˆ(TTS)**

| Service | Support Status |
| - | - |
| Voicevox Engine | ðŸŸ¢ å¯¾å¿œæ¸ˆ |
| AivisSpeech Engine | ðŸŸ¢ å¯¾å¿œæ¸ˆ |
| ã«ã˜ãƒœã‚¤ã‚¹API | ðŸŸ¢ å¯¾å¿œæ¸ˆ |
| OpenAI | âŒ æœªå¯¾å¿œ(å°†æ¥å¯¾å¿œäºˆå®š) |
| Style-Bert-VITS2 | âŒ æœªå¯¾å¿œ(å°†æ¥å¯¾å¿œäºˆå®š) |

**VoicevoxEngineã®è¨­å®šä¾‹**:  
VoicevoxEngineã¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã§ç¨¼åƒã•ã›ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚  
[å…¬å¼ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆ](https://github.com/VOICEVOX/voicevox_engine)ã«å¾“ã„VoicevoxEngineã‚’èµ·å‹•ã—ã€  
ãã®ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆï¼ˆä¾‹: `http://localhost:50021`ï¼‰ã‚’ `.env` ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã® `AGENT_1_TTS_BASE_URL` ã«æŒ‡å®šã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

### ðŸŽ§ **éŸ³å£°èªè­˜(STT)**

| Service | Support Status |
| - | - |
| faster-whisper | ðŸŸ¢ å¯¾å¿œæ¸ˆ |
| OpenAI Whisper | âŒ æœªå¯¾å¿œ(å°†æ¥å¯¾å¿œäºˆå®š) |

`faster-whisper`ã¯Pythonãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒªã‚’é€šã˜ã¦å‹•ä½œã—ã¾ã™ãŒã€ç‰¹åˆ¥ãªå¤–éƒ¨ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹èµ·å‹•ã¯ä¸è¦ã§ã™ã€‚ï¼ˆ`requirements.txt`ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§åˆ©ç”¨å¯èƒ½ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ï¼‰

### **ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆ** 

| Endpoint        | Support Status             |
|-----------------|----------------------------|
| text to text    | ðŸŸ¢ å¯¾å¿œæ¸ˆ                  |
| text to voice   | ðŸŸ¢ å¯¾å¿œæ¸ˆ                  |
| text to video   | âŒ æœªå¯¾å¿œ(å°†æ¥å¯¾å¿œäºˆå®š)   |
| voice to text   | ðŸŸ¢ å¯¾å¿œæ¸ˆ                  |
| voice to voice  | ðŸŸ¢ å¯¾å¿œæ¸ˆ                  |
| voice to video  | âŒ æœªå¯¾å¿œ(å°†æ¥å¯¾å¿œäºˆå®š)   |
| video to text   | âŒ æœªå¯¾å¿œ(å°†æ¥å¯¾å¿œäºˆå®š)   |
| video to voice  | âŒ æœªå¯¾å¿œ(å°†æ¥å¯¾å¿œäºˆå®š)   |
| video to video  | âŒ æœªå¯¾å¿œ(å°†æ¥å¯¾å¿œäºˆå®š)   |

### **ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹çµ±åˆ**

| Service | Support Status             |
|---------|----------------------------|
| LINE    | ðŸŸ¢ å¯¾å¿œæ¸ˆ                  |
| Slack   | âŒ æœªå¯¾å¿œ(å°†æ¥å¯¾å¿œäºˆå®š)   |
| Discord | âŒ æœªå¯¾å¿œ(å°†æ¥å¯¾å¿œäºˆå®š)   |

â€» æœªå¯¾å¿œæ©Ÿèƒ½ãƒ»ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯ã€[Projectã‚¿ãƒ–](https://github.com/0235-jp/karakuri_agent/projects)ã‚„[Discussions](https://github.com/0235-jp/karakuri_agent/discussions)ã§é–‹ç™ºçŠ¶æ³ãƒ»ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒžãƒƒãƒ—ã‚’ã”ç¢ºèªãã ã•ã„ã€‚

## âš¡ ç‰¹å¾´

- **å¹…åºƒã„ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆå¯¾å¿œ**  
  - ðŸ“ Text to Text  
  - ðŸ’¬ Text to Voice  
  - ðŸŽ¤ Voice to Text 
  - ðŸ”„ Voice to Voice

- **ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«é¸æŠžã®æŸ”è»Ÿæ€§**  
  LiteLLMã‚’ç”¨ã„ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€LiteLLMãŒã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ« (ä¾‹: OpenAI, Ollama) ã«å¯¾å¿œå¯èƒ½ã€‚

- **è¤‡æ•°ã‚¨ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒ³ãƒˆç®¡ç†**  
  `.env` ã§è¤‡æ•°ã‚¨ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’å®šç¾©å¯èƒ½ã€‚å½¹å‰²ã‚„æ€§æ ¼ã€éŸ³å£°ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãªã©ã‚’è‡ªç”±ã«è¨­å®šã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

- **ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹é€£æº**  
  ç¾åœ¨ã¯ **LINE** ã«å¯¾å¿œã€‚å°†æ¥çš„ã«ã¯ä»–ã®ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ³ã‚°ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã‚„éŸ³å£°ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ•ã‚§ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã¨ã®é€£æºã‚‚äºˆå®šã€‚

## ðŸŽ¥ ãƒ‡ãƒ¢ãƒ»ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒƒãƒˆ

*é–‹ç™ºä¸­ã®ãŸã‚ã€å¾Œæ—¥æ›´æ–°äºˆå®šï¼*  
Flutterã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã®ç”»é¢ã‚„éŸ³å£°ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®GIFã‚’å…¬é–‹äºˆå®šã§ã™ã€‚

## ðŸ“¦ ç’°å¢ƒè¦ä»¶

- **ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ‰**  
  - Python 3.8ä»¥ä¸Š  
  - (ä»»æ„) VoicevoxEngine (TTSç”¨)  
    - ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã§VoicevoxEngineã‚’èµ·å‹•ã—ã€`.env`ã§ãã®URLã‚’è¨­å®šã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„  
  - (ä»»æ„) LINEé€£æºã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ã€[LINE Developer Console](https://developers.line.biz/ja/)ã‚ˆã‚Šãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³ãƒ»ã‚·ãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒˆå–å¾—ãŒå¿…è¦

- **å„ç¨®LLMã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«åˆ©ç”¨æ™‚**  
  - æœ‰åŠ¹ãªAPIã‚­ãƒ¼ãŠã‚ˆã³ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒãƒƒãƒˆæŽ¥ç¶šãŒå¿…è¦ã€‚

- **Ollamaãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«åˆ©ç”¨æ™‚**  
  - Ollamaã‚’ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã§èµ·å‹•ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

## ðŸ› ï¸ ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«æ–¹æ³•

### Docker Composeã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆ

ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã«ã‚ã‚‹`compose.yml`ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€  
ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã‚’ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒŠã§ä¸€æ‹¬èµ·å‹•ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

```bash
docker compose up
```

ä¸Šè¨˜ã‚³ãƒžãƒ³ãƒ‰ã§`http://localhost:8080` ã§ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ãŒèµ·å‹•ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

`.env`ã¯äº‹å‰ã«è¨­å®šã—ã¦ãŠã„ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

### ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ‰ã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—(æ‰‹å‹•)

1. `.env`ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®ä½œæˆã€åŠã³å¿…è¦ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ä¿®æ­£
   ```bash
   cp example.env .env
   ```
   `.env`ã§ã‚¨ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒ³ãƒˆæ•°ã‚„ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«è¨­å®šã€APIã‚­ãƒ¼ãªã©ã‚’è¨­å®šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
   
2. å¿…è¦ãªãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«  
   ```bash
   pip install -r requirements.txt
   ```
3. ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼èµ·å‹•  
   ```bash
   uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080
   ```
   â†’ `http://localhost:8080` ã§FastAPIã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ãŒèµ·å‹•ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

## ðŸ’¡ ä½¿ã„æ–¹

- Swagger UIã§APIã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒžãƒƒãƒˆã‚’ç¢ºèªãŠã‚ˆã³å®Ÿè¡Œ  
  `http://localhost:8080/docs`

## âš™ï¸ è¨­å®šãƒ»ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒžã‚¤ã‚º

`.env` ã‚„ç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°ã§è¨­å®šå¯èƒ½ã§ã™ã€‚ä¾‹:  
```
API_KEYS=ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ç”¨ã®APIã‚­ãƒ¼ã‚’ã‚«ãƒ³ãƒžåŒºåˆ‡ã‚Šã§æŒ‡å®š
LINE_MAX_AUDIO_FILES=LINEçµ±åˆã§åˆ©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹éŸ³å£°ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®æœ€å¤§ä¿å­˜ä»¶æ•° (ä¾‹:5)
LINE_AUDIO_FILES_DIR=line_audio_files
CHAT_MAX_AUDIO_FILES=Chatã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆã§åˆ©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹éŸ³å£°ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®æœ€å¤§ä¿å­˜ä»¶æ•° (ä¾‹:5)
CHAT_AUDIO_FILES_DIR=chat_audio_files
WEB_SOCKET_MAX_AUDIO_FILES=WebSocketã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆã§åˆ©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹éŸ³å£°ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®æœ€å¤§ä¿å­˜ä»¶æ•° (ä¾‹:5)
WEB_SOCKET_AUDIO_FILES_DIR=websocket_audio_files

AGENT_1_NAME=ã‚¨ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒ³ãƒˆã®åå‰
AGENT_1_MESSAGE_GENERATE_LLM_BASE_URL=ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ç”Ÿæˆç”¨LLMã®URL(LiteLLMå½¢å¼)
AGENT_1_MESSAGE_GENERATE_LLM_API_KEY=ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ç”Ÿæˆç”¨LLMã®APIã‚­ãƒ¼
AGENT_1_MESSAGE_GENERATE_LLM_MODEL=ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ç”Ÿæˆç”¨LLMã®ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«(LiteLLMå½¢å¼)
AGENT_1_EMOTION_GENERATE_LLM_BASE_URL=è¡¨æƒ…ç”Ÿæˆç”¨LLMã®URL(LiteLLMå½¢å¼)
AGENT_1_EMOTION_GENERATE_LLM_API_KEY=è¡¨æƒ…ç”Ÿæˆç”¨LLMã®APIã‚­ãƒ¼
AGENT_1_EMOTION_GENERATE_LLM_MODEL=è¡¨æƒ…ç”Ÿæˆç”¨LLMã®ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«(LiteLLMå½¢å¼)
AGENT_1_VISION_GENERATE_LLM_BASE_URL=ç”»åƒèªè­˜ç”¨LLMã®URL(LiteLLMå½¢å¼)â€»ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ç”Ÿæˆç”¨LLMãŒç”»åƒã«éžå¯¾å¿œãªå ´åˆã«åˆ©ç”¨
AGENT_1_VISION_GENERATE_LLM_API_KEY=ç”»åƒèªè­˜ç”¨LLMã®APIã‚­ãƒ¼
AGENT_1_VISION_GENERATE_LLM_MODEL=ç”»åƒèªè­˜ç”¨LLMã®ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«(LiteLLMå½¢å¼)
AGENT_1_TTS_TYPE=åˆ©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹TTSã®ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—(å¯¾å¿œType:voicevox,nijivoice(AivisSpeechã‚‚voicevoxã‚’æŒ‡å®šãã ã•ã„ã€‚))
AGENT_1_TTS_BASE_URL=TTSã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆã®URL
AGENT_1_TTS_API_KEY=TTSã®APIã‚­ãƒ¼(ãªã‘ã‚Œã°ç©ºç™½ã§å•é¡Œæœ‰ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“)
AGENT_1_TTS_SPEAKER_MODEL=TTSã®ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«(å¯¾å¿œãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«:default)
AGENT_1_TTS_SPEAKER_ID=TTSã®ã‚¹ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ¼ID
AGENT_1_LLM_SYSTEM_PROMPT=ã‚¨ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒ³ãƒˆã«è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒˆ
AGENT_1_LINE_CHANNEL_SECRET=LINEãƒãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒãƒ«ã‚·ãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒˆ(LINEçµ±åˆã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯å¿…è¦)
AGENT_1_LINE_CHANNEL_ACCESS_TOKEN=LINEãƒãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒãƒ«ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯ãƒ³(LINEçµ±åˆã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯å¿…è¦)

# AGENT_2_... ã¨æŽ¥é ­è¾žã‚’å¢—ã‚„ã™ã“ã¨ã§ã€è¤‡æ•°ã‚¨ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒ³ãƒˆãŒå®šç¾©å¯èƒ½
```

## ðŸ¤ ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒªãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆæ–¹æ³•

1. Issueã§ãƒã‚°å ±å‘Šãƒ»æ”¹å–„ææ¡ˆã‚’æ­“è¿Žã—ã¾ã™ï¼  
2. `main`ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒã‹ã‚‰ä½œæ¥­ç”¨ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã€Pull Requestã‚’ãŠé€ã‚Šãã ã•ã„ã€‚  
3. æ©Ÿèƒ½ææ¡ˆã‚„è³ªå•ã¯[Discussions](https://github.com/0235-jp/karakuri_agent/discussions)ã§ã‚‚å—ã‘ä»˜ã‘ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

## ðŸ“œ ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚»ãƒ³ã‚¹ã«ã¤ã„ã¦

æœ¬ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã¯ç‹¬è‡ªã®ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚»ãƒ³ã‚¹è¦ç´„ã«åŸºã¥ã„ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

- **éžå•†ç”¨åˆ©ç”¨**: å€‹äººã«ã‚ˆã‚‹å­¦ç¿’ãƒ»ç ”ç©¶ãƒ»è¶£å‘³ç›®çš„ãªã©ã®éžå•†ç”¨åˆ©ç”¨ã¯ç„¡æ–™ã§å¯èƒ½ã§ã™ã€‚æ”¹å¤‰ç‰©ã‚’å†é…å¸ƒã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ã€è‘—ä½œæ¨©è¡¨ç¤ºã¨æœ¬ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚»ãƒ³ã‚¹å…¨æ–‡ã‚’ä¿æŒã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚
- **å•†ç”¨åˆ©ç”¨**: æœ¬ã‚½ãƒ•ãƒˆã‚¦ã‚§ã‚¢ã¾ãŸã¯ãã®æ”¹å¤‰ç‰©ã‚’ç”¨ã„ã¦åŽç›Šã‚’å¾—ã‚‹ã€å•†æ¥­çš„ç›®çš„ã§ã®åˆ©ç”¨ã«ã¯ã€äº‹å‰ã«æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾0235ã¨ã®å•†ç”¨ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚»ãƒ³ã‚¹å¥‘ç´„ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™ã€‚
ä¸æ˜Žãªç‚¹ã‚„å•†ç”¨åˆ©ç”¨ã®ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚»ãƒ³ã‚¹å–å¾—ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯ã€[karakuri-agent-support@0235.co.jp](mailto:karakuri-agent-support@0235.co.jp) ã¾ã§ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

è©³ç´°ã¯ [LICENSE](LICENSE_JP) ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ã”ç¢ºèªãã ã•ã„ã€‚

## ðŸ› ï¸ æ§‹ç¯‰ãƒ»é‹ç”¨ã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆ

æœ¬ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã®æ§‹ç¯‰ãƒ»é‹ç”¨ã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹æœ‰å„Ÿã§ã®ã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚‚æ‰¿ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚æ–™é‡‘ã¯è¦ä»¶ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ãŠè¦‹ç©ã‚Šã¨ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã®ã§ã€è©³ç´°ã¯ [karakuri-agent-support@0235.co.jp](mailto:karakuri-agent-support@0235.co.jp) ã¾ã§ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

## ðŸ”— é–¢é€£ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒ»å‚è€ƒè³‡æ–™

- [FastAPIå…¬å¼ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆ](https://fastapi.tiangolo.com/)  
- [Flutterå…¬å¼ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆ](https://docs.flutter.dev/)  
- [LINE Messaging API](https://developers.line.biz/ja/docs/messaging-api/)  
- [LiteLLM](https://github.com/BerriAI/litellm)  
- [Voicevox Engine](https://github.com/VOICEVOX/voicevox_engine)  
- [AivisSpeech Engine](https://github.com/Aivis-Project/AivisSpeech-Engine)  
- [Style-Bert-VITS2](https://github.com/litagin02/Style-Bert-VITS2)  
- [faster-whisper](https://github.com/guillaumekln/faster-whisper)  
- [OpenAI Whisper](https://github.com/openai/whisper)  
- [Ollama](https://docs.ollama.ai/)
- [ã«ã˜ãƒœã‚¤ã‚¹APIãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆ](https://docs.nijivoice.com/docs/getting-started)

================
File: README.md
================
# ðŸ¤– Karakuri Agent

æ—¥æœ¬èªžç‰ˆã¯ã“ã¡ã‚‰ [README_JP.md](README_JP.md).

**Karakuri Agent** is an open-source project aiming to create an **AI agent** accessible from any environmentâ€”whether it's a smart speaker, chat tool, or web application. By integrating various endpoints and services, it aims to realize a world where you can **access a single agent** from **anywhere**.  
You can also define multiple agents simultaneously, each with unique roles, personalities, voices, and models.

## Technical Overview

### ðŸš€ **Server-Side**
- Framework: FastAPI

### ðŸª¶ **Model Support (LLM)**
By utilizing LiteLLM, you can access models supported by [LiteLLM](https://github.com/BerriAI/litellm), such as OpenAI and Ollama.  
- **Example for OpenAI models**: Obtain an [OpenAI API Key](https://platform.openai.com/) and configure it in `.env`.  
- **Example for Ollama models**: Run [Ollama](https://docs.ollama.ai/) locally and set its URL in `.env`.

### ðŸŽ™ï¸ **Text-To-Speech (TTS)**

| Service            | Support Status        |
|--------------------|-----------------------|
| Voicevox Engine     | ðŸŸ¢ Supported          |
| AivisSpeech Engine  | ðŸŸ¢ Supported          |
| Niji Voice API      | ðŸŸ¢ Supported          |
| OpenAI              | âŒ Not supported yet (planned) |
| Style-Bert-VITS2    | âŒ Not supported yet (planned) |

**Example for VoicevoxEngine Setup**:  
VoicevoxEngine must be running locally.  
Follow the [official documentation](https://github.com/VOICEVOX/voicevox_engine) to start it.  
Then set the endpoint (e.g., `http://localhost:50021`) in `AGENT_1_TTS_BASE_URL` within your `.env` file.

### ðŸŽ§ **Speech-To-Text (STT)**

| Service         | Support Status        |
|-----------------|-----------------------|
| faster-whisper  | ðŸŸ¢ Supported          |
| OpenAI Whisper  | âŒ Not supported yet (planned) |

`faster-whisper` works as a Python library and does not require an external service.  
Once installed via `requirements.txt`, it's ready to use.

### **Endpoints**

| Endpoint        | Support Status             |
|-----------------|----------------------------|
| text to text    | ðŸŸ¢ Supported               |
| text to voice   | ðŸŸ¢ Supported               |
| text to video   | âŒ Not supported yet (planned) |
| voice to text   | ðŸŸ¢ Supported               |
| voice to voice  | ðŸŸ¢ Supported               |
| voice to video  | âŒ Not supported yet (planned) |
| video to text   | âŒ Not supported yet (planned) |
| video to voice  | âŒ Not supported yet (planned) |
| video to video  | âŒ Not supported yet (planned) |

### **Service Integrations**

| Service  | Support Status             |
|----------|----------------------------|
| LINE     | ðŸŸ¢ Supported               |
| Slack    | âŒ Not supported yet (planned) |
| Discord  | âŒ Not supported yet (planned) |

For unsupported features or services, please check the [Project tab](https://github.com/0235-jp/karakuri_agent/projects) or [Discussions](https://github.com/0235-jp/karakuri_agent/discussions) for updates and roadmap.

## âš¡ Features

- **Wide Range of Endpoints**  
  - ðŸ“ Text to Text  
  - ðŸ’¬ Text to Voice  
  - ðŸŽ¤ Voice to Text 
  - ðŸ”„ Voice to Voice

- **Flexible Model Selection**  
  By using LiteLLM, you can support any models that LiteLLM supports (e.g., OpenAI, Ollama).

- **Multiple Agent Management**  
  You can define multiple agents in `.env`, customizing roles, personalities, voice profiles, and more.

- **Service Integration**  
  Currently integrates with **LINE**. Future plans include other messaging services and voice interfaces.

## ðŸŽ¥ Demo / Screenshots

*Under developmentâ€”will be added later!*  
We plan to provide screenshots or GIFs showing the Flutter client and voice interaction.

## ðŸ“¦ Requirements

- **Server-Side**  
  - Python 3.8 or later  
  - (Optional) VoicevoxEngine for TTS  
    - Run VoicevoxEngine locally and set the URL in `.env`.  
  - (Optional) For LINE integration, obtain tokens and a secret from the [LINE Developer Console](https://developers.line.biz/en/).

- **LLM Model Usage**  
  - Requires valid API keys and an internet connection.

- **Ollama Model Usage**  
  - Requires Ollama running locally.

## ðŸ› ï¸ Installation

### Using Docker Compose

If you have `compose.yml` at the project root, you can start the server with Docker Compose.

```bash
docker compose up
```
The above command will start the server at `http://localhost:8080`.

Make sure to set up `.env` beforehand.

### Manual Setup: Server-Side

1. Copy and edit `.env` as needed:  
   ```bash
   cp example.env .env
   ```
   Configure agents, models, API keys, etc. in `.env`.
   
2. Install required packages:  
   ```bash
   pip install -r requirements.txt
   ```
3. Start the server:  
   ```bash
   uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080
   ```
   â†’ Server will run at `http://localhost:8080`.

## ðŸ’¡ Usage

- Check and interact with the API format via Swagger UI:  
  `http://localhost:8080/docs`

## âš™ï¸ Configuration

You can configure the application via `.env` or environment variables. Example:  
```
API_KEYS=Specify server access API keys separated by commas
LINE_MAX_AUDIO_FILES=Max number of audio files for LINE integration (e.g., 5)
LINE_AUDIO_FILES_DIR=line_audio_files
CHAT_MAX_AUDIO_FILES=Max number of audio files for Chat endpoint (e.g., 5)
CHAT_AUDIO_FILES_DIR=chat_audio_files
WEB_SOCKET_MAX_AUDIO_FILES=Max number of audio files for web_socket endpoint (e.g., 5)
WEB_SOCKET_AUDIO_FILES_DIR=web_socket_audio_files

AGENT_1_NAME=Name of the agent
AGENT_1_MESSAGE_GENERATE_LLM_BASE_URL=Base URL for message generation LLM (LiteLLM style)
AGENT_1_MESSAGE_GENERATE_LLM_API_KEY=API key for message generation LLM
AGENT_1_MESSAGE_GENERATE_LLM_MODEL=Model for message generation LLM (LiteLLM style)
AGENT_1_ANALYZE_GENERATE_LLM_BASE_URL=Base URL for analyze generation LLM (LiteLLM style)
AGENT_1_ANALYZE_GENERATE_LLM_API_KEY=API key for analyze generation LLM
AGENT_1_ANALYZE_GENERATE_LLM_MODEL=Model for analyze generation LLM (LiteLLM style)
AGENT_1_VISION_GENERATE_LLM_BASE_URL=Base URL for vision LLM (LiteLLM style)â€»Used when LLM for message generation does not support images
AGENT_1_VISION_GENERATE_LLM_API_KEY=API key for vision LLM
AGENT_1_VISION_GENERATE_LLM_MODEL=Model for vision LLM (LiteLLM style)
AGENT_1_TTS_TYPE=TTS type (supported: voicevox,nijivoice; use voicevox for AivisSpeech as well)
AGENT_1_TTS_BASE_URL=TTS endpoint URL
AGENT_1_TTS_API_KEY=TTS API key (can be blank)
AGENT_1_TTS_SPEAKER_MODEL=TTS model (e.g., default)
AGENT_1_TTS_SPEAKER_ID=TTS speaker ID
AGENT_1_LLM_SYSTEM_PROMPT=System prompt for the agent
AGENT_1_LINE_CHANNEL_SECRET=LINE channel secret (required if LINE integration is used)
AGENT_1_LINE_CHANNEL_ACCESS_TOKEN=LINE channel access token (required if LINE integration is used)

# Increase AGENT_2_, AGENT_3_, etc. for multiple agents
```

## ðŸ¤ Contributing

1. Feel free to file issues for bugs or improvement suggestions!  
2. Create a working branch from `main` and open a Pull Request.  
3. Feature proposals and questions are also welcome in [Discussions](https://github.com/0235-jp/karakuri_agent/discussions).

## ðŸ“œ About the License

This project is provided under a custom license agreement.

- **Non-Commercial Use**: Non-commercial use, such as personal learning, research, or hobby projects, is permitted free of charge. If you redistribute modified versions, please retain the original copyright notice and the full text of the license.
  
- **Commercial Use**: If you wish to use this software or its derivatives for commercial purposes or to generate revenue, you must obtain a commercial license from 0235 Inc. in advance.  
  If you have any questions or need to acquire a commercial license, please contact us at [karakuri-agent-support@0235.co.jp](mailto:karakuri-agent-support@0235.co.jp).

For more details, please see the [LICENSE](LICENSE) file.

## ðŸ› ï¸ Support for setup, configuration, and ongoing operation

We also offer paid support for setup, configuration, and ongoing operation. Fees depend on your requirements. For more information, please contact us at [karakuri-agent-support@0235.co.jp](mailto:karakuri-agent-support@0235.co.jp)

## ðŸ”— Related Projects / References

- [FastAPI Documentation](https://fastapi.tiangolo.com/)  
- [Flutter Documentation](https://docs.flutter.dev/)  
- [LINE Messaging API](https://developers.line.biz/en/docs/messaging-api/)  
- [LiteLLM](https://github.com/BerriAI/litellm)  
- [Voicevox Engine](https://github.com/VOICEVOX/voicevox_engine)  
- [AivisSpeech Engine](https://github.com/Aivis-Project/AivisSpeech-Engine)  
- [Style-Bert-VITS2](https://github.com/litagin02/Style-Bert-VITS2)  
- [faster-whisper](https://github.com/guillaumekln/faster-whisper)  
- [OpenAI Whisper](https://github.com/openai/whisper)  
- [Ollama](https://docs.ollama.ai/)
- [Niji voice API Documentation](https://docs.nijivoice.com/docs/getting-started)

================
File: requirements.txt
================
fastapi==0.115.6
uvicorn[standard]==0.34.0
python-dotenv==1.0.1
litellm==1.55.12
aiohttp==3.11.11
pydantic==2.10.4
faster-whisper==1.1.0
soundfile==0.12.1
python-multipart==0.0.20
line-bot-sdk==3.14.2
pydub==0.25.1
pyright==1.1.391
ruff==0.8.4
redis==5.2.1
pytz==2024.2

================
File: start.sh
================
#!/bin/sh

exec uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080 --log-config /app/uvicorn_log_config.yaml

================
File: uvicorn_log_config.yaml
================
version: 1
disable_existing_loggers: false

formatters:
  standard:
    format: '%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s'
  access:
    format: '%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s'

handlers:
  console:
    class: logging.StreamHandler
    formatter: standard
    stream: ext://sys.stdout
  file:
    class: logging.handlers.RotatingFileHandler
    formatter: standard
    filename: /app/logs/application.log
    maxBytes: 10485760  # 10MB
    backupCount: 5
  access_file:
    class: logging.handlers.RotatingFileHandler
    formatter: access
    filename: /app/logs/access.log
    maxBytes: 10485760  # 10MB
    backupCount: 5

loggers:
  uvicorn:
    handlers: [console, file]
    level: INFO
  uvicorn.access:
    handlers: [access_file]
    level: INFO
    propagate: false
  watchfiles.main: 
    level: WARNING 
    handlers: [console, file]

root:
  level: INFO
  handlers: [console, file]
  propagate: no
